summary: Set some items weight to zero
descriptionHtml:
this mod will set the weight of the following items:
<br />books, ore, ingots, pelts alchemy ingredients, as well as dragon bones and scales, claw keys, firewood, pick axe, woodcutter axe, dwemer smeltables, and food.Â 
<br />very simple mod that wont cause CTD (Crash to Desktop)
<br />100% guaratee satisfaction (no CTD , Lag , Bug , Etc. )
<br />100% compatible with all mods and DLC's except for those mods who also modify weights.
<br />GLHF!
<br />
author: Zaraki Zenken Besin
